metadata.description:
In 2021 we wrote an album and filmed a documentary called, "Islanders". (islandersfilm.com)

In 2022 we released the album and documentary via Kamikaze Dogfight and Gravitas Ventures. We toured the music and film all over the country and capped it off with a premiere in our East Hollywood neighborhood in Los Angeles. Segnon pulled up. 

We've admired Segnon's musicality and commitment to his craft since meeting him. He showed interest in working on something together and was in particular excited by our project, "Islanders". 

Our song "Home" was originally written with the intent of having a hip-hop verse. We posed the idea and Segnon jumped at it; correction, he crushed it. 

The song is about constantly redefining what "Home" means as we navigate life and death. More specifically, it's about a soul that hasn't found a resting place.

"Home" (Segnon Remix) is available on all streaming services and is intended to be played LOUD.

lyrics.text:
You won't know home until you test
What it's like to never rest
How do you find peace when you're at war with yourself
Before you find home, you'll find something else 

All on my own on this road  trying to make my way (HOME)
I’m going home hoping that take the pain away (HOME)
No looking back cause it don’t hit the same today 

Changed in a major way
Pray that I’m A-Okay 
Pray that I’m A-Okay 

People gon say what they wanna say 
I can control what’s in front of me
All these vampires keep calling me 
Chasing me down and confronting me, hunting me

Suddenly something keeps pulling me home 
I’m moving fast case they follow me home 

Try not to panic, I’m breaking the habit  
And facing the ultimate challenge 
I’m going back home

What it's like to never rest
It's hard to find peace when you're at war with yourself 
Before you find home you'll find something else

Home

metadata.name: "Home" (Segnon Remix) #1
metadata.title: "Home" (Segnon Remix)
